title: How to write a letter to an immigration officer - Quora

response.answer_text: First, be sure you are in the U.S. LEGALLY! If not, please respect our laws and borders and return home until you can enter under our immigration laws. Otherwise, you will naturally be at constant risk of deportation, something every country does to those who have entered without permission.
The same as with any kind of official communication: be clear, concise, detailed, objective, and respectful. Simple.
